name: Friendship in the Fire Services: Snap Decisions in Stifling Suit -2v3
description: One of a series of digital-to-analog-to-digital drawings. High security protection suits are complicated. Their use must be practiced constantly. The internet is full of photos that are taken in the process.  Maybe because the emergency services, like everyone else, have to document what they are doing; or out of pride in competent handling; or because it is a nice opportunity to counter the to-be-drilled serious emergency with humour. A good way to stay sane. www.christiansievers.info
